discourse_list.title: Lightning Talks: Signaling: Technical challenges with measuring sentiment

content.content: Here are the slides to my lightning talk on signaling and voting, and the trade-offs for each method. https://drive.google.com/file/d/1bQiSw8UveVT_R2f3Yhla61ad6FRefptf/view?usp=sharing Join us on Riot! #ethsignaling:matrix.org

@phillux @GriffGreen your signalling session is the second half of the video that starts with Jack’s web3 talk:    view.ly    Lightning Talk: Web3 Tech Stack, Jack Platt & Community Signalling, Griff... First half, Jack Platt from the Presentation and discussion thread: https://ethereum-magicians.org/t/lightning-talks-web3-tech-stack/726 Second half, Griff & Phil covered Signalling. Presentation and discussion thread:...      Clickable link to join the EthSignaling Matrix channel http://riot.im/app/#/room/#ethsignaling:matrix.org
